title: Exquisite Mayura Nakshi Haaram with Emerald Centerpiece
features: Features a classic South Indian design with intricately carved peacocks (Mayura Nakshi) adorning the pendant. The pendant is set with high-quality CZ stones in a filigree pattern, surrounding a vibrant emerald center stone. Delicate flower motifs with ruby accents dangle along the necklace, adding a touch of feminine charm. The chain showcases a unique, interconnected circular link design, reflecting expert craftsmanship.
occasions: and festive occasions like Diwali or Sankranthi. Also suitable for upscale evening events where a touch of traditional elegance is desired.
description: This Haaram is a testament to timeless South Indian jewelry artistry. The intricate Mayura Nakshi work and the vibrant gemstone combination create a piece that is both visually stunning and culturally significant. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine and durability. The use of premium quality CZ stones offers the brilliance of diamonds at an accessible price point. A true heirloom piece to be cherished for generations.
